Developer Terms of Use
des:
WELCOME TO THE ERA OF INTELLIGENT LIGHTING

BRILIA PRESENTS
LIGHTSENSE

Discover the most innovative Wi-Fi lighting control technology.

Inspired by the concept Internet of Things (IoT) and fully designed, developed and produced in Brazil by Brilia and specialized partners, LightSense combines innovation, mobility and practicality to put the transforming power of light in your hands. A perfect match between LED Brilia technology and digital intelligence that has come to change the way you relate to light.

GET STARTED WITH ALEXA

To connect your LightSense device to Alexa, first, you need a LightSense app account. You can create one by downloading the app on your smartphone. After that, you can enable this skill, and link to your LightSense account. Then click on discover to find your devices. And that’s it, you are ready to control your lights using only your voice.

ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES FOR TRANSFORMING THE LIGHTING

With LightSense you can customize the lighting and create incredible scenes in the most different environments and locations. Control it when, how, and wherever you want.

CHOOSE HOW YOU WANT TO CONTROL IT

Developed to provide greater mobility, with LightSense you can change and activate the light using the most different control tools.
The best way to control the light is always your way.

• Smartphone
• Tablet
• Smartwatch
• Smart touch dimmer
• Voice Assistant
